content: it takes time to build a handmade closet that one loves as crochet wearables take more time than accessories the tunisian cabriolet hug was an experiment in creating a convertible wearable from simple shapes and it worked by strategically placing buttons you can create two different looks that offer varying levels of warmth also the featured stitch tunisian clover stitch creates a fun texture of leaning mini clusters and open spaces this creates a soft flowing fabric that is easy to make and wear with a casual or dressy outfit on a chilly day indulge in the art of tunisian crochet with our tunisian cabriolet hug pattern this versatile design can be worn as a poncho or a shrug making it a must-have addition to your wardrobe the pattern is perfect for advanced beginners looking to expand their skills with tunisian crochet with detailed written instructions and a video tutorial available you ll be guided through each step of creating this stylish piece the heathered tweed yarn from loops & threads adds a touch of sophistication to the project ensuring a cozy and chic finished result embrace the beauty of tunisian crochet and create a unique garment that will turn heads wherever you go **unique features-** versatile design can be worn as a poncho or shrug detailed written instructions and video tutorial available heathered tweed yarn adds sophistication to the project perfect for advanced beginners looking to expand their skills in tunisian crochet **materials needed-** hook 6 5mm us size 10 5 yarn heathered tweed dk / sport weight 500-795 yards 20 mm button x 14 gauges 14 stitches x 10 row = 4 inches in modified tunisian simple stitch 14 stitches by 10 row = 4 inches in tunisian simple stitch **finished sizes** 27 x 16 \ 68 5 cm x 40 6 cm\ x-small / small/ medium 31 x 18 \ 78 7 cm x 45 7 cm\ large / x-large / 2x-large 37 x 20 \ 94 cm x 50 8 cm\ 3x-large / 4x-large / 5x-large 42 x 22 \ 106 7 cm x 55 9 cm\ 6x-large / 7x-large
